title: Young watch almost seven times less TV than over-65s - Ofcom
description: The average 16 to 24-year-old watches TV for 53 minutes a day compared with nearly six hours for over-65s.

title: How to make movies without a huge carbon footprint
description: The film and TV industry is switching towards greener energy sources but the transition has challenges.

title: Holocaust activist seems to talk to guests at her funeral
description: Conversational video tech allowed the late Marina Smith to answer mourners' questions via recordings.

title: Chinese internet giants hand algorithm data to government
description: Alibaba and Tiktok-owner ByteDance are among firms that have shared information with regulators.
